question_text: Which deployment scenario would most likely use IaaS?
answer_options: A team accessing Microsoft 365 through web browsers
A business using Salesforce CRM out-of-the-box
An e-commerce company configuring Linux servers on AWS
A school using Google Docs to collaborate
correct_answer: An e-commerce company configuring Linux servers on AWS
explanation: Provisioning custom Linux servers on cloud infrastructure is a textbook example of an IaaS implementation.
